# The `GenericSetterWithIdx` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Similar to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/genericsetter">GenericSetter</a> but the setters/getters have an index as their first argument. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;auto GetterFn, auto SetterFn&gt;
class llvm::sandboxir::GenericSetterWithIdx&lt;GetterFn, SetterFn&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Similar to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/genericsetter">GenericSetter</a> but the setters/getters have an index as their first argument.

This is commont in cases like: getOperand(unsigned Idx)

Definition at line 303 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/tracker-h">Tracker.h</a>.
